            __typename: value$1.__typename,
            nullable: !(value$2 == null) ? value$2 : undefined,
            nonNullable: value$1.nonNullable

        };
}

function serialize(value) {
  var value$1 = value.customScalarField;
  var value$2 = value$1.nonNullable;
  var value$3 = value$1.nullable;
  var nullable = value$3 !== undefined ? value$3 : null;
  var value$4 = value$1.__typename;
  var customScalarField = {
    __typename: value$4,
    nullable: nullable,
    nonNullable: value$2
  };
  return {
          customScalarField: customScalarField
        };
}

function serializeVariables(inp) {
  var a = inp.opt;
  return {
          opt: a !== undefined ? a : undefined,
          req: inp.req
        };
}

function makeVariables(opt, req, param) {
  return {
          opt: opt,
          req: req
        };
}
